text: Ara yara tadera prabhuke bhayabhakti kare tadera niye ya'oya habe dalabad'dhabhabe jannatera dike. Yete yete yakhana tara tara kache asabe o era darajagulo khule de'oya habe takhana tara raksira tadera balabe, ''salama tomadera upare! Tomara pabitra-caritra, sutaram tomara ete cirasthayibhabe prabesa karo.â€™â€™
